005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.library;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.DynamicContext;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.ISequence;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathConstants;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IArgument;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.function.IFunction;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.IItem;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IAnyAtomicItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.atomic.IStringItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
017
018import java.util.Arrays;
019import java.util.List;
020import java.util.stream.Collectors;
021import java.util.stream.Stream;
022
023import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
024
025/**
026 * Implements the XPath 3.1 <a href=
027 * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-concat">fn:concat</a>
028 * function.
029 */
030public final class FnConcat {
031  private static final String NAME = "concat";
032  @NonNull
033  static final IFunction SIGNATURE = IFunction.builder()
034      .name(NAME)
035      .namespace(MetapathConstants.NS_METAPATH_FUNCTIONS)
036      .deterministic()
037      .contextIndependent()
038      .focusIndependent()
039      .argument(IArgument.builder()
040          .name("arg1")
041          .type(IAnyAtomicItem.type())
042          .zeroOrOne()
043          .build())
044      .argument(IArgument.builder()
045          .name("arg2")
046          .type(IAnyAtomicItem.type())
047          .zeroOrOne()
048          .build())
049      .allowUnboundedArity(true)
050      .returnType(IStringItem.type())
051      .returnOne()
052      .functionHandler(FnConcat::execute)
053      .build();
054
055  private FnConcat() {
056    // disable construction
057  }
058
059  @SuppressWarnings("unused")
060  @NonNull
061  private static ISequence<IStringItem> execute(
062      @NonNull IFunction function,
063      @NonNull List<ISequence<?>> arguments,
064      @NonNull DynamicContext dynamicContext,
065      IItem focus) {
066
067    return ISequence.of(concat(ObjectUtils.notNull(arguments.stream()
068        .map(arg -> {
069          assert arg != null;
070          return (IAnyAtomicItem) arg.getFirstItem(true);
071        }))));
072  }
073
074  /**
075   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
076   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-concat">fn:concat</a>.
077   *
078   * @param items
079   *          the items to concatenate
080   * @return the atomized result
081   */
082  @NonNull
083  public static IStringItem concat(IAnyAtomicItem... items) {
084    return concat(ObjectUtils.notNull(Arrays.asList(items)));
085  }
086
087  /**
088   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
089   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-concat">fn:concat</a>.
090   *
091   * @param items
092   *          the items to concatenate
093   * @return the atomized result
094   */
095  @NonNull
096  public static IStringItem concat(@NonNull List<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> items) {
097    return concat(ObjectUtils.notNull(items.stream()));
098  }
099
100  /**
101   * An implementation of XPath 3.1 <a href=
102   * "https://www.w3.org/TR/xpath-functions-31/#func-concat">fn:concat</a>.
103   *
104   * @param items
105   *          the items to concatenate
106   * @return the atomized result
107   */
108  @NonNull
109  public static IStringItem concat(@NonNull Stream<? extends IAnyAtomicItem> items) {
110    return IStringItem.valueOf(ObjectUtils.notNull(items
111        .map(item -> item == null ? "" : IStringItem.cast(item).asString())
112        .collect(Collectors.joining())));
113  }
114}
